meanings.definition: Intrusion on a person's territory, rights, etc.
meanings.sent1: The encroachments on the playground by the neighboring construction caused disputes.
meanings.sent2: The encroachments on the property line led to a legal battle between the neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The encroachments of the mischievous squirrels into the bird feeder amused the children.
meanings.sent4: The encroachments of technology into our daily lives are like vines slowly taking over a garden.
meanings.sent5: The encroachments of the loud music from the party next door made it impossible to sleep.
